dct_title_s: Route map of the Bombay Presidency
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; Includes: Polymetrical table shewing the distances between the civil and military stations and large towns of the Bombay presidency; index to collectorates and districts.; J. & C. Walker, Sculpt.
147 x 90 Centimeters, folded to 21 x 12 Centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_creator_sm: East India Company. Army. Bombay Army
